segments.text: I don't know . I think you might be over the hill .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , if not gymnastics , then mountain biking .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mountain biking is an Olympic sport ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Since 1996 it has been . And I bet I'd be pretty good at it . I ride my mountain bike to work almost every day .
segments.speaker: S2
